sections.transliteration: Hari Om Tat Sat Shri Narayana tu, Purosottam Guru Tu
sections.translation: Thou art the only Truth, Narayana, The Supreme Self, the Divine Master,

sections.transliteration: Siddha Buddha Tu, Skanda Vinayaka, Savita Pavaka Tu
sections.translation: Siddha, Buddha, Skanda, Vinayaka, The Sun, the Holy Fire,

sections.transliteration: Brahma Maazda Tu, Yahava Shakti tu, Ishu Pitta Prabhu Tu
sections.translation: Brahman, Ahura Mazda, Jehovah, Shakti, Jesus, Father, Lord,

sections.transliteration: Rudra Vishnu Tu, Ram Krishna Tu, Rahima Tao Tu
sections.translation: Rudra, Vishnu, Rama, Krishna, Raheem, the Tao,

sections.transliteration: Vasudeva Gau Vishvarupa Tu, Chidanand Hari Tu
sections.translation: Vasudeva, the Universe, Vishvarupa, Chidananda, Hari,

sections.transliteration: Advit√≠ya Tu Akal Nirbhaya, Atma Linga Shiva Tu
sections.translation: The Non-Dual, the Timeless One, the Fearless One,  The Self-manifested, Shiva

sections.transliteration: Hari Om Tat Sat Shri Narayana tu, Purosottam Guru Tu
sections.translation: Thou art the only Truth, Narayana, The Supreme Self, the Divine Master,

sections.transliteration: Siddha Buddha Tu, Skanda Vinayaka, Savita Pavaka Tu
